---
title: "LMU Open Science Center"
page-navigation: false
toc: false
repo-actions: false
format:
  html:
    page-layout: full
    grid:
      sidebar-width: 0px
      body-width: 1250px
      margin-width: 200px
      gutter-width: 2em
title-block-banner: "assets/img/osc_image_assets/Banner1.jpg"
listing:
  - id: news-carousel
    template: news/news2.ejs
    contents: news/news
    sort: "date desc"
include-after-body: 
  - text: |
      <script src="assets/javascript/remove_title.js" defer></script>
include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <script src="/assets/javascript/clear_filter_button.js" defer></script>
      <style>
      .quarto-title-block .quarto-title-banner {
        background-position-y: center;
        height: 400px;
      }
      
      .quarto-title-banner {
        box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
      }
      
      /* Mission Statement Section Styling */
      .mission-statement-container {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
      }
      
      .mission-statement-card {
        border: 2px solid #2c5f8d;
        border-radius: 8px;
        padding: 2.5rem;
        width: 100%;
        background-color: #f8fafc;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.1);
        transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .mission-statement-card:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.15);
      }
      
      .mission-statement-card h2 {
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #2c5f8d;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 2px;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        text-align: center;
      }
      
      .mission-statement-card p {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        line-height: 1.8;
        color: #333;
        text-align: center;
        margin: 0;
      }
      
      /* Impact Metrics Section Styling */
      .impact-container {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 3rem 0;
      }
      
      .impact-card {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 3rem 2rem;
        border: 2px solid #2c5f8d;
        border-radius: 8px;
        background-color: #f8fafc;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.1);
      }
      
      .impact-card h2 {
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: #2c5f8d;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 2px;
        text-align: center;
        margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
      }
      
      .impact-metrics {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
        gap: 2rem;
      }
      
      .metric {
        text-align: center;
      }
      
      .metric-value {
        font-size: 3.5rem;
        font-weight: 800;
        color: #2c5f8d;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        line-height: 1;
      }
      
      .metric-label {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: #444;
        line-height: 1.5;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
      }
      
      /* Override carousel-dark filter for news carousel controls */
      #newsCarousel.carousel-dark .carousel-control-prev-icon,
      #newsCarousel.carousel-dark .carousel-control-next-icon {
        filter: none;
      }
      
      /* News carousel wrapper styling */
      .carousel-styled-wrapper {
        background-color: #f8fafc;
        padding: 1rem 1rem 0.5rem 1rem; 
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(44, 95, 141, 0.1);
      }
      </style>
      <link href="/assets/bootstrap-5.3.8-dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
css: /custom-navbar.css
